body:
In the Basic Usage documentation, we use several levels of section headers. One of them in particular (`~~~~~~~~`) is not supported by Sphinx. Normally this is fine; Sphinx knows what you meant. But when you have levels below that level, Sphinx raises an error:

```
basic_usage.rst:1269: SEVERE: Title level inconsistent:

Select module files by spec constraints
"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""
```

This bug was discovered in #1576 by adding documentation testing. It will be fixed in #1576. This issue is being opened to track the problem.
title: Documentation: Title level inconsistent
